feels.name: Anticipation
feels.quote: Rose sat at her window considering her day.

feels.name: Sadness
feels.quote: Rose, who between lunch and tea had left off thinking about Frederick, was now, between tea and dinner, thinking of him harder than ever.

feels.name: Affection
feels.quote: He fathered some of the most entertaining ideas he had lately had on to Lady Droitwich, and also any charming funny things that had been done—or might have been done, for he could imagine almost anything.

feels.name: Wonder
feels.quote: Scrap’s eyes grew round with wonder and affectionate pride in her mother.

feels.name: Melancholy
feels.quote: Scrap, who had become melancholy at the sight of Briggs, became philosophical at the sight of Arundel.

Places.name: Window
Places.description: Rose sat at her window considering her day.

Places.name: Deep_windowrecess
Places.description: Ferdinand Arundel stood in one of the deep window-recesses looking out at the distant lights of Mezzago.
